subject: Sports Injuries
All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV)
Deaths (Fatalities)
X Games
Snowmobiles
lead_paragraph: The X Games drive revenue while showcasing sports like motocross and freestyle snowmobiling, but last year came a first: a death in competition, of Caleb Moore.
snippet: The X Games drive revenue while showcasing sports like motocross and freestyle snowmobiling, but last year came a first: a death in competition, of Caleb Moore.
